Projects.title: GBS Scoping Model
Projects.description: Worked in developing ML predictive model based on various analysis like Creating Derived fields, Correlation matrix, Feature importance, Evaluation metrics (confusion matrix, f1-score, accuracy), Parameter tuning and finding optimal algorithms out of Logistic, RF, XGBoost for finding the employees who can be scoped from Philips to Philips GBS

Projects.title: DESSA
Projects.description: Website to identify the processes across GBS that can be automated. The functionalities includes Role-Based User Management, Email Trigger after User assess process, DataStructures to track creating, assigning and performing assessment

Projects.title: Analytics Project Tracker
Projects.description: Created website for the team to take in new projects from stakeholders, assign them to managers, create tasks under them, and assign it to Team members. Allows updating status, deadline triggers, OTD/FTR calculation, displaying overdue/risk tasks

Projects.title: Monthly Performance Mobile APP
Projects.description: Created cross-platform mobile app using react native that uses Azure authentication and showcases graphs and data matrix about the monthly target and actuals for every process performed by GBS

Projects.title: PowerApps Daily Management
Projects.description: Created a PowerApps solution for daily standup to capture peer's WL/Mood, top of mind items, Action Tracker, Analytics Board to know status of projects. This is an initiative to digitize activities performed using excel. It also uses MS Flow to trigger data transformation jobs for auto report generation

Projects.title: Excel/PPT Report Automations
Projects.description: Worked on automating more than 10 reports involving scenarios like Creating multiple calculated columns by translating excel formulas into pandas Automatic excel generation including merged cells, color formatting, borders, and sheet split-ups Data transfer from various sources like data in Sharepoint, Azure DataLake, DeltaLake, SQL Servers Employee data fetch using MS Graph API Pipeline creation in Azure Databricks to orchestrate automatic delivery on a periodic basis, pywin32 to replicate VBA functions and reduce effort in excel and PPT dashboarding

Projects.title: Power BI Reports
Projects.description: Worked on multiple Power BI reports involving data transformation using PowerQuery and DAX for creating calculated columns

Projects.title: Azure ,AWS, Power BI Maintanence
Projects.description: Being the POC for technology within the team, I would assist employees in case of access requirements, feasability checks, solution proposals, faulty data loads, deploying their code, and monitoring for surges

value.title: Multimedia Telegram Bot
value.description: It was my initial mystomedia bot before moving on with Fast API

value.title: Mystomedia API
value.description: Mystomedia API uses Fast API to provide a RESTful API for Mystomedia App. It involves web scraping using BS4 and selenium to perform get contents loaded from JS, Rclone for cloud orchestration and serves audio and video files to front end using streaming API and hosted in heroku using Docker.

value.title: Mystomedia
value.description: Mystomedia is a personal multimedia suite to download media content from Google Drive with search functionality using Drive Api V3 and content feeds from OMDB Api. Other features include download from spotify, deezer and regional movie sites. It uses firebase for authentication

value.title: Expense Tracker
value.description: A personal expense tracker app that helps you track your expenses and keep track of your budget. It uses firebase for authentication and firestore for database. Uses Lottie view for animation, Native Base for UI. It has 4 screens - Favourites, Expense Types , Expense History and Consolidated View.

value.title: Personal Automations
value.description: A collection of utilities that simplifies everyday windows usages. Curently includes Multimedia downloaders within commandline, torrent searcher and streamer using jackett API, youtube downloader and cloud uploader using python , PDF pass remover, Photo organiser ,Powershell commandline utilities for adding env variables and package downloading.

value.title: Power BI - DAX and Power Query

value.Name: Azure DP-900
value.Description: To master data in the cloud, you need the right foundationâ€”a solid understanding of core data concepts, such as relational data, nonrelational data, big data, and analytics. Plus, familiarity with the roles, tasks, and responsibilities in the world of data and data analytics. The certification offers the foundation you need to build your technical skills to start working with data in the cloud. Mastering the basics can help you jump-start your career and prepare you to dive deeper into other technical opportunities Azure offers.
